author: Dave's Garage
description:
Dave explains how the Cloud exposes us to aggregated, correlated risks rather than the types of failures we have become accustomed to in the PC age.  Free Sample of my Book on the Spectrum: https://amzn.to/3zBinWM

Rapid Fix: https://amzn.to/48WkG4x

For the Slate AX 1800: https://amzn.to/49hKPt2

Check out ShopTalk, our weekly podcast, every Friday!
https://www.youtube.com/@davepl
title: The BIG Outage: The One System That Can Take Down Everything
